content.heroIntro: Welcome to MASCARAT BAY VIEWS, an exclusive residential development by the renowned developer BOGSA, strategically positioned in the prestigious Mascarat area of Calpe, Alicante. This premium project showcases 3 exceptional units featuring apartments, penthouses, and villas with 3-4 bedrooms, ranging from 244 to 368m² of meticulously designed living space. Starting from €1,200,000, MASCARAT BAY VIEWS represents an outstanding investment opportunity in one of Costa Blanca's most sought-after coastal destinations. With completion scheduled for December 2027, this development combines modern architectural excellence with proximity to world-class amenities, including the Blue Flag Arenal-Bol beach just minutes away and the championship Club de Golf Ifach. Whether you're seeking a Mediterranean home, a luxury investment property with impressive rental potential, or a retirement haven in a thriving international community, MASCARAT BAY VIEWS delivers on every level. BOGSA's commitment to quality construction, sustainable features, and attention to detail ensures your new home will be a valuable asset for decades to come.

locationSection.intro: Mascarat is a coveted residential enclave nestled between the vibrant town of Calpe and the tranquil coastline of the Costa Blanca. This exclusive neighborhood attracts discerning international buyers seeking an authentic Mediterranean lifestyle without sacrificing modern conveniences. Mascarat benefits from its elevation, offering stunning sea views and a peaceful residential atmosphere while remaining just minutes from Calpe's bustling marina, excellent restaurants, and cultural attractions. The area is characterized by tree-lined streets, quality developments, and a strong sense of community among long-established British and German residents. With direct access to pristine beaches including the award-winning Arenal-Bol, world-class golf courses, and a comprehensive range of healthcare and educational facilities, Mascarat represents the perfect balance of coastal living and suburban tranquility. The upcoming TRAM connection will further enhance accessibility to surrounding regions, making this location increasingly desirable for both primary residents and investment buyers.
